Test character describes survival object

Source: R/finalfit_internal_functions.R
is.survival.Rd

Test character describes survival object

is.survival(.name)

Arguments

.name

Character string to test

Value

Logical

Examples

var_s = "Surv(mort, time)"
is.survival(var_s) #TRUE
#> [1] TRUE
var_s = "Sur(mort, time)"
is.survival(var_s) #FALSE
#> [1] FALSE
